title: HTML Detective
description:
HTML is the language that creates web pages! Every element has tags like

for headings or

for paragraphs. Your task: View the source code of THIS challenge page and find the hidden HTML element! WHAT TO DO: 1. Right-click on this page and select 'View Page Source' 2. Look for an HTML element with the attribute 'data-secret' 3. The value of that attribute is your answer 4. Submit it as FLAG{value_you_found} EXAMPLE: If you found

, the flag would be FLAG{hello123} LEARN: HTML elements can have special attributes that store information. These attributes might not be visible on the page, but they're in the code!
hints: Use Ctrl+F (or Cmd+F) to search for 'data-secret' in the page source
Look for an attribute like data-secret="something" in the HTML
The answer is the text inside the quotation marks after data-secret=
